nodes.text: Heavy Lifting is a mini three-part roleplaying game adventure that appears in Instant Adventures, published by West End Games in December 1996.
A group of spacers are contracted by F'ej D'aw, but Nawnam, D'aw's boss, needs to escape the planet after a failed assassination attempt on Ganis.
At the Vapor Scream, they are confronted by the Stalkers and are chased out.
They rendezvous with Ganis the Hutt while they decide how to evacuate the spaceport.
After securing a repulsortruck, they retrieve Ganis and make it to their ship to escape the Stalkers and make it to safety on Nar Shadda.
